page.title: 05Runnymede/Greenlee Schools
page.content: { Northumberland County Council}is the local education authority. {Education}is provided in 3 stages; First Schools.....5-9yrs, Middle Schools....9-13yrs, High Schools.....13-18yrs { Runnymede and Greenlee County {First Schools}are on the same site and serve an area of about 1 mile radius. Our survey showed 72% of parents moved to this area for the educational facilities.In September 1985 these two schools will be merged and re-named {Darras Hall County First School.}At {Runnymede School}78% of the children had attended some form of{pre-school education:27% of the children go to a{Sunday School}regularly. {Clubs}for pupils after school include Y.O.C, country dancing,choir,boys' games, gymnastics,short tennis,book-club and lace-making.
